title: How Do I Talk On The League of Legend Board
body: I do not understand how I am supposed to comment on the boards

replies.body: when I try and do that it say that I need to be level 7 or higher what does that mean

This likely happened due to a difference between your Summoner and Boards profiles. Posting this thread seems to have synced those two profiles and it now shows you as level 28. You shouldn't see any issues posting on the boards now, but let me know if that is not the case.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cojc2K3E,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-07-12T17:43:10.160+0000)
>
> This likely happened due to a difference between your Summoner and Boards profiles. Posting this thread seems to have synced those two profiles and it now shows you as level 28. You shouldn't see any issues posting on the boards now, but let me know if that is not the case.

Thnx it seems to be working now
Type a message in the "Leave a comment" box or click "Reply" or "Quote" on another player's post.
